body.name: Flamaker Standing Desk, Electric Adjustable Height Stand up Desk, 63 x 24 Inches Home Office Computer Desk with T-Shaped Metal Bracket and Memory Preset, White
features: SIT TO STAND: Sitting for long time makes you feel tired, try to experience our standing desk. Simply press the up and down button, you will be freed from sedentary to achieve health and efficiency.

MEMORY ELECTRIC LIFT: The design of sitting/standing memory keys allows it to be adjusted quickly and accurately to your preset comfortable height. Height customized function brings convenience to different people who use this stand up desk.

DURABLE QUIET MOTOR: The motor is made of good quality and each has been tested more than ten inspection processes. You can adjust the height between 28.7”-45.3” at a speed of 1"/second with low noise.

HIGH BUT STABLE: The electric standing desk is tall enough to meet the demands of a standing office, while an industrial-grade metal frame and a solid wood tabletop keep this adjustable standing desk stable at the highest heights.

LARGE WORKSTATION: The desktop of this computer desk with a maximum size of 63 x 24 inches which is made of solid wood and provides ample space to put a laptop and other office supplies needed. Round desk corners and wires hole is safe and convenient. NOTE: The desktop is consisted of three pieces, it is not come in one complete piece.
body.description: Description: This Flamaker electric desk can meet your need for sit to stand dual-use. Its height adjustment and memory preset function allow you to adjust the comfortable height and return to your preferred height. Large desktop provides you with enough space to work. Choose this standing desk to create a healthy office style. Specification: - Color: Black/White/Brown - Material: Wood, Metal - Desktop Dimension: 43.3”L x 24”W / 55.1”L x 24”W / 63”L x 24”W - Adjustable Height: 28.7"-45.3" - Weight Capacity: 132lbs

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 22 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewerName: S. C. H. S. C. H.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: All components were excellently packed, with added rubber protection for the board edges to prevent damage during shipping. I was delighted to find no chips on the surface upon unboxing. The parts were neatly organized and clearly labeled, making assembly a breeze in just 10-15 minutes. The instructions were concise, accompanied by helpful visuals of tools and screws. The table's lift function operates quietly and smoothly, exceeding my expectations for the price. Overall, I'm pleased with its functionality, cost-effectiveness, and the time it saves me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great standing desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk is pretty close to being exactly what I wanted. It is adjustable, has plenty of space, and decently sturdy. My only complaints are that the top piece comes in 2 halves, so you have a seam down the middle of the desk, and that the instructions were just pictures. There were no written instructions which was difficult. Over all super happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not the easiest to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: You will need patience and strength to assemble. Once assembled though, works pretty well! Very good quality table definitely can be set very high if needed or as low as a regular table! Definitely recommend good buy for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This desk is so great! So easy to put together and works wonderfully!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great desk - control function is weak
reviews.reviewText: This is great desk for the price, considering it was less than $100 for a 55 inch desk. It was easy to assemble though there are a lot of wood screws, so be prepared for a few hours of grafting to screw everything together, but otherwise, the directions were decent and it is all fairly self-explanatory to put together. Desk looks good and it's nice that it comes with a cup holder and headphones hook, as well as cable snatches and cable ring hiders in the desk. It also came with a bunch of screws that were not needed, so don't stress, when you have leftover pieces - my desk has not fallen apart yet! My only complaint is the desk control panel for raising/lowering is really cheap and I feel like it may break in a few months. It's pretty crappy, but the desk raises up and lowers fine without any real noise, so hopefully it will last. I am not sure paying $400 would have got me much more, so overall this is a sound purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worth the money! Very affordable and it looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't go that low and came a little defective/damaged
reviews.reviewText: It seems ok. I am a little sad it doesn't go that low where I can sit comfortably and use the keyboard on the table. I may need a stool or just use it as a standing desk only. There was also a defect/damage on a bracket, which seems fine. The table itself is split into two pieces and joined together which is so so. If I would have spent more I would have expected more. The motor itself seems fine and works smoothly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but time consuming to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I really like this desk. I bought so I could stand or walk while I do work but it was confusing to put together- none of the parts were labeled. That would have made assembly easier and I had to undo a couple of mistakes but I eventually figured it out. Otherwise, it’s a good desk.
